subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After the Magic tied the game at 68-68, the Heat, without Dwyane Wade, went on a 20-2 run, swatting away any potential threat at their race toward history.
snippet: After the Magic tied the game at 68-68, the Heat, without Dwyane Wade, went on a 20-2 run, swatting away any potential threat at their race toward history.
